Uses of Package
org.mcm.sws.process

Packages that use org.mcm.sws.process
org.mcm.sws.process Provides classes that hold data describin SESMA web service processes and a process execution engine for the automatic execution of such processes. 
 

Classes in org.mcm.sws.process used by org.mcm.sws.process
Activity
          Abstract superclass of Activities.
AtomicActivity
          abstract superclass of activities that do not contain (user defined) sub-activities.
Case
           
CompoundActivity
          abstract superclass of activities that DO contain (user defined) sub-activities.
ExecutionException
          this exception is thrown during process execution if a critical error occurs.
Process
          This class represents am executable SESMA process.
ProcessInput
          Input needed for instantiating the process.
ProcessInstance
          An instance of a SESMA process
WebServiceActivity
          an abstract superclass for process activities that deal with (the interaction with) web services.
